title: Christmas pie
summary: Combine a few key Christmas flavours here to make a pie that both children and adults will adore

title: Christmas cupcakes
summary: Made these for the second time today, and I have to say they turned out great! I've got large muffin tins and the mixture made 15 muffins, will definitely make these again at Christmas time and decorate festively.

title: Christmas slaw
summary: A nutty winter salad which is super healthy, quick to prepare and finished with a light maple syrup dressing

title: Christmas mess
summary: Delicious and a cinch to make! Have made this a couple of times as a dinner party dessert, very pretty as a winter alternative to Eton mess.

summary: A festive take on brownies with rosemary sprigs and glac√© cherries.

title: Christmas cosmopolitan
summary: Mix vodka, ginger wine, cranberry juice, and lime juice for a refreshing cocktail.

title: Christmas pizza
summary: Use up leftover roast turkey and sausage meat stuffing in this new spin on an Italian classic.
